overview: Jacek - a middle-aged man, uses the services of a company that transforms people into trees. The process of his transformation is supervised by Doctor Buk and therapist Melisa, who make sure that he is fully aware of the consequences and that his decision is not accidental.

production_companies.name: Szkoła Filmowa im. Krzysztofa Kieślowskiego Uniwersytetu Śląskiego

title: There Is No Peace of Mind
